list.title: Agents
list.emptyDescription: Create your first agent to get started

detail.testDescription: Apply this configuration to the Chat panel
detail.publishDescription: Make this agent publicly accessible via API and web page
detail.name: Name
detail.systemPromptHelp: Additional instructions appended to the default system prompt
detail.modelHelp: Select the LLM model to use (default: Kimi K2.5)
detail.clearConversationConfirm: Applying an agent preset will clear the current conversation. Continue?

create.title: Create Agent
create.subtitle: Create a reusable Agent configuration
create.chatDescription: Describe what you need and the agent-builder will plan skills, create new ones if needed, and set up your Agent automatically.
create.name: Agent Name
create.nameHelp: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
create.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
create.nameMaxLength: Name must be at most 128 characters
create.descriptionPlaceholderForm: Describe what this agent configuration is for...
create.systemPromptPlaceholderForm: Optional: Add custom instructions for the agent...
create.systemPromptHelp: Additional instructions appended to the default system prompt
create.skillsHelp: Select skills this agent can use
create.toolsHelp: Select built-in tools (leave empty for all)
create.modelHelp: Select the LLM model to use (default: Kimi K2.5)
create.executorHelp: Default runs code locally in the API container. Select an executor to run in an isolated container.
create.builderDescription: Let AI help you configure your agent

delete.title: Delete Agent
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

publish.title: Publish Agent
publish.description: Make this agent available via public URL

responseMode.title: API Response Mode
responseMode.immutableNote: This cannot be changed after publishing without unpublishing first.

apiUsage.title: API Usage
apiUsage.streamingNote: Returns Server-Sent Events (SSE). Use -N flag to disable buffering.
apiUsage.nonStreamingNote: Returns a single JSON response with the complete answer.
apiUsage.sessionIdNote: The session_id is a client-generated UUID. Use the same ID across requests to maintain conversation context.
apiUsage.docsLink: Full documentation on Published Agent API

publish.dialogDescription: Select the model that this published agent will use. Users will interact with this model when using your agent.
publish.modelHelp: This model will be used for all conversations with the published agent.
publish.noModelWarning: No model selected. The default model (Kimi K2.5) will be used.

unpublish.title: Unpublish Agent
unpublish.confirm: Are you sure you want to unpublish this agent?
unpublish.description: The public URL will no longer be accessible.
